00058 class NBTrafficLightLogic : public Named {
00059 public:
00064     class PhaseDefinition {
00065     public:
00067         SUMOTime duration;
00068 
00070         std::string state;
00071 
00076         PhaseDefinition(SUMOTime durationArg, const std::string& stateArg)
00077             : duration(durationArg), state(stateArg) { }
00078 
00080         ~PhaseDefinition() { }
00081 
00086         bool operator!=(const PhaseDefinition& pd) const {
00087             return pd.duration != duration || pd.state != state;
00088         }
00089 
00090     };
00091

00098     NBTrafficLightLogic(const std::string& id, const std::string& subid, unsigned int noLinks) ;
